mapper.select: SELECT torder.order_id,torder.order_status,torder.order_money ,torder.order_createTime from tb_mlfront_order as torder, tb_mlfront_checkoutview as tbcheckout WHERE torder.order_id = tbcheckout.checkoutView_order_id AND torder.order_createTime BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY torder.order_id
